scripts.deploy: nodemon --watch src --watch test --ext sh,sql,psql --exec sh src/deploy.sh
scripts.deploy_test: nodemon --watch src --watch test --ext sh,sql,psql --exec sh src/deploy_test.sh
scripts.test:sql: nodemon --watch src --watch test --ext sh,sql,psql --exec sh test/run.sh
scripts.test:api: nodemon --watch src --watch test_api --ext sql,psql,js,hurl --exec sh test_api/run.sh
